TEXT.TITLE: AMEX SEAT SELLS FOR RECORD 380,000 DLRS
TEXT.BODY: The American Stock Exchange said a seat on the exchange sold for 380,000 dlrs, a record price that is 5,000 dlrs higher than the previous sale on Feb 17. The current bid is 330,000 dlrs and the offer, 425,000 dlrs, the exchange said. Reuter
